description: Retrieves a paginated list of component summaries. This list includes components that you have permission to view.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the components to list. Default: PRIVATE.

nested_items.name: components
nested_items.description: A list that summarizes each component.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the component version.

nested_items.name: latestVersion
nested_items.description: The latest version of the component and its details.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the component version.

nested_items.name: creationTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the component was created, expressed in ISO 8601 format.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the component version.

nested_items.name: publisher
nested_items.description: The publisher of the component version.

nested_items.name: platforms
nested_items.description: The platforms that the component version supports.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The friendly name of the platform. This name helps you identify the platform.

nested_items.name: attributes
nested_items.description: A dictionary of attributes for the platform. The IoT Greengrass Core software defines the os and architecture by default. You can specify additional platform attributes for a core device when you deploy the Greengrass nucleus component. For more information, see the Greengrass nucleus component in the IoT Greengrass V2 Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of results, or null if there are no additional results.
